Crown clean and thin Oak tree (T1 of TPO170) by no more than 20%, crown lift to give 5.5 metre ground level clearance over the carriageway and trim back from the house to give no more than 2 metre clearance

Crown clean three Oak trees (one is T7 of TPO283) to remove major dead wood and crossing branches and reduce southern aspect of canopies' lower edge by no more than 2 metres from cardinal points to clear property opposite

Crown lift 2 Birch trees (G1) to give a 2 metre clearance over the footpath, crown thin 7 Plum trees (G2) and 5 Plum trees (G4) by up to 20% and reduce back lateral limbs to clear buildings by 2 metres, crown lift Birch tree (G3) and 9 Birch trees (G7) to give a 2 metre clearance over the footpath and crown thin by up to 20%, crown thin 3 Birch trees (G5), 3 Plum trees (G6), Plum tree (G8), 4 Birch trees (G9), Plum tree (G10), Birch tree (G11), Plum tree (G12), Birch tree (G13), Plum tree (G14), Birch tree (G15), Birch tree and Plum tree (G16), Birch tree (G19) AND Birch tree (G21) by up to 20%, sever Ivy from Hawthorn (G17) and deadwood Cherry tree (G18) and Cherry tree (G20). All trees part of TPO342.
Crown lift Beech tree (T1 of TPO317) to give a 4.5 metre ground level clearance by removing six medium sized branches and crown thin by 20%

Crown lift Laurel tree (1) to give a 2.5 metre ground level clearance, fell and chip out stump of Plum tree (2), crown lift Horse Chestnut tree (4) to give a 4 metre ground level clearance, remove the lowest horizontal sub branches of Sycamore tree (5) to a height of 4 metres, fell and chip out stump of Lawson Cypress (G7), fell and chip out stump of Lawson Cypress (G8), repollard Maple tree (9) at 4 metres, repollard three Lime trees (10, 11, 12) at 4 metres, remove the five lowest ascending sub branches of Sycamore tree (13) in the south west section of the canopy to provide a minimum 3 metre clearance from the building, fell Pear tree (14), fell Sycamore tree (15), remove lower sub branches of Sycamore tree (16) to provide a minimum 2 metre clearance over the roof of the outbuilding and remove the side stem at its point of origin 3 metres above ground level that extends over the site, fell and chip out stumps of two Sycamore trees (19, 20), crown lift Sycamore tree (21) to give a 3 metre clearance over the boundary line and raise the northern side of the canopy of Holly tree (22) to give a 3 metre ground level clearance

Crown lift Oak tree (T11 of TPO432) to give a 3 metre ground level clearance, remove epicormic growth and dead wood and reduce two branches to the South by 3-4 metres, one branch to the West by 2 metres from crossing point with T12 and two branches to the East to secondary growth point, crown lift Beech tree (T12 of TPO432) to give a 3 metre ground level clearance, remove epicormic growth and dead wood and reduce branches to provide a 2 metre clearance from the house, crown lift Beech tree and Oak tree (G5 of TPO432) to give a 3 metre ground level clearance or 4 metres over access, remove epicormic growth and dead wood and remove secondary growth to give approximately 1 metre clearance from telephone cables and crown lift Beech tree and Oak tree (G4 of TPO432) to give a 3 metre ground level clearance or 4 metres over access, remove epicormic growth and dead wood
Crown lift Oak tree (T2 of TPO343) to give a 3 metre ground level clearance and crown reduce by 25%
Crown lift Oak tree (T4 of TPO279A) to give a 5 metre ground level clearance and deadwood throughout
Crown lift Oak tree (T55 of TPO431A) to give an approximate 18 foot ground level clearance by removal of small diameter growth and remove all major deadwood
